name: Word War III
description:
Word War III is a Minimalistic Multiplayer Typing Battle Royale Game

Gather with your friends and find out who is the fastest typer!
Attack other players with word-rockets and Defend your own base!

Play locally and online.

Words are customizable! You can play the game in ANY LANGUAGE!!! just make a list of words to use.

Upcoming changes:

  • Powerups!!!

The game is still under development, try it out and tell us if something went wrong :)
